title: Samoa’s election: Personal rivalries, geopolitical tensions and everything else you need to know
summary: Samoa is set to hold parliamentary elections on Friday amid ongoing political turmoil. The elections follow a period of instability that has affected the country's governance. Voters will have the opportunity to shape the future of their leadership during this critical moment.

title: Country diary: The sight – and smell – of a habitat success story | Paul Evans
summary: The Stiperstones nature reserve in Shropshire has expanded to include two sites from a community organization. This development emphasizes a commitment to restoration in addition to conservation efforts. The initiative aims to enhance the area's natural beauty and biodiversity.

title: Meet the water sommeliers: they believe H₂O can rival wine – but would you pay £19 a bottle?
summary: A restaurant in Cheshire, England, has introduced a water menu, similar to initiatives by various US establishments. This concept raises the question of whether it's possible to distinguish between different water sources and their unique terroirs. The trend reflects a growing interest in the nuances of water, similar to wine tasting.
